Terrain::VertexLodManager

This class manages the set of vertex LOD entries for a single terrain block, generating or unloading as necessary. More...

Classes

struct  WorkingSet
 This is the range of LOD indexes (inclusive) that comprise a working set. More...

Detailed Description

This class manages the set of vertex LOD entries for a single terrain block, generating or unloading as necessary.

See also:
VertexLodEntry

TerrainBlock2

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

VertexLodManager::VertexLodManager ( TerrainBlock2 &  owner,
uint32  numLods 
)

Construct an empty TerrainLodManager with space for a given number of LODs.

Parameters:
owner Reference to owning block.
numLods How many LODs to create.

void Terrain::VertexLodManager::getTargetWorkingSet ( uint32  lod,
WorkingSet &  workingSet,
uint32  topLod 
) const [inline, protected]

Get range of terrain LODs that are required for a given LOD level.

This will correctly account for the end cases where there is only one neighbour.

Parameters:
lod target LOD index.
workingSet result set.
topLod the top lod level to use
